thread.title: Kazakhstan: Move to Curb Independent Groups (HRW - Human Rights Watch)

author: wn.com
title: Kazakhstan: Move to Curb Independent Groups (HRW - Human Rights Watch)
text: ( Source : HRW - Human Rights Watch ) ( Berlin ) - Kazakhstan 's senate is considering a draft law that would impose serious restrictions on nongovernmental organizations, Human Rights Watch said today. The proposed restrictions are incompatible
